```{r echo=FALSE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, paged.print=FALSE, results="hide"}
dB <- sample(0:120, 1)
  
ans <- dB / 10 - 12

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans / 10, format = FALSE)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%s $\\mathsf{W / m^2}$", formatC(10^sc$questions, format = "E", flag = "#", digits = 2))
```

Question
========
What is the intensity of a `r dB` dB sound?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The intensity of the sound is

$$ 10^{`r dB/10` - 12} = `r formatC(10^ans, format = "E", flag = "#", digits = 3)` \,\mathsf{W/m^2} $$
